mage amma wasara 35 ka wishwawidyala sewayen wishamikawayi dan inne.mage ekama nangi waidyawariyak.mama wruththiyen rajyaya aayathanayaka ihala kalamanakarithwayata ayath mandalika niladhariyek.mama godak kamathi wela hitiye wishwawidyalaka adhyayana karya mandalayehi purna kalinawa sewaye niratha wennayi.namuth eekata wada wishala sudusukam pramanayak ma sathuwa thibeddith mata wada adu sudusukam athi ayata ee awasthawa himiwuna.ma jiwithaye dadi se akamathima kshethraya wana paripalanaye usas mandalika niladhariyeku wela ada innawa.eeka mama hithakawath thibune nathi deyak.mama paudgalikawa sara parusha kenek neweyi.
